section.heading: Relation to federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
section.text: This chapter modifies, limits, or supersedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 467; 15 U.S.C. § 7001 et seq.), but does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101 of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7001(a) ) or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103 of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7003(b) ).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 14 of the Uniform Environmental Covenants Act.
